income_messages:
From: i**************3@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-05 19:04:20
SUBJECT: Dear Sir,
Dear Sir,
Ref.: Transfer Payment Approval Notice. OF US$5,800,000.00
Approved Payment Valued: US$5,800,000.00.
Payment Reference No.:  UNION BANK /LHO-BOE/XXCL3002/21
We write to inform you officially that we have received and confirmed
a transfer authorization instruction from United Nations Funds
Investigation Unit in your favor valued at US$5,800,000.00 (Five
Million Eight Hundred Thousand US Dollars Only). Please note that this
approved long awaited Contract/Inheritance payment Instruction has
been verified by our Legal Department through the rightful Authorities
for a smooth Credit to your Bank account via Swift Telegraphic Wire
Transfer or ATM card respectively.
Note that paying bank will bear the cost of transferring your fund
either wire transfer or atm master card and 
the only charges required
from you is the sum of $50 for {INTERNATIONAL SECURITY  FUND TRANSFER
PERMIT}
As the Chief Financial Officer, UNION  BANK(NIGERIA ) I write to
inform you that the above amount is ready to be released to you.
Kindly reconfirm  to me the following details
Full name,
Address and
Telephone number
Bank Details
AS SOON AS I CONFIRM YOUR DETAILS I WILL ADVISE YOU ON HOW YOU SEND
THE $50 FOR INTERNATIONAL SECURITY  FUND TRANSFER PERMIT}}
Thank you for your anticipated co-operation.
Awaiting your response.
WAITING
DR ROSEMARY IBEKWE
FOREIGN PAYMENT DIRECTOR UNION BANK NIGERIA PLC
From: i**************3@gmail.com
To: nb69530@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-06 11:09:14
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
WHAT QUESTION DO YOU WANT TO ASK
IAM WAITING
From: i**************3@gmail.com
To: nb69530@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-06 16:48:04
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
DEAR ANITA
THIS IS THE COPY OF YOUR ATM MASTER
I ADVISE YOU TO CHOOSE ANY OF THESE OPTION TO SEND THE $50 FOR
INTERNATIONAL SECURITY TRANSFER PERMIT
1. WORDREMIT
2. REMITLY
ONCE I CONFIRM FROM YOU I WILL ADVISE YOU ON HOW YOU SEND THE FEE
From: i**************3@gmail.com
To: nb69530@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-06 17:14:51
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
if you are not ready to confirm your fund let us know

Anita Bassford

 Kind Regards,
Anita Bassford
